kit.leader_skill: "Earth-Protecting Heroes" or "Saviors" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +130%

super_attack.name: Hercule's Rage
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK; Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage; A high chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Trustworthy in Crucial Moments
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 250% up; (Forever) "Earth-Protecting Heroes" Category allies' Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 50% up; For every attack received or evaded: (Forever) DEF 30% up (up to 150%); When there is another "Earth-Protecting Heroes" Category ally attacking in the same turn: Chance of evading enemy's attack 45% up; Before receiving an attack within the turn: Damage reduction rate 90% up; After receiving an attack: Chance of evading enemy's attack 40% up; After evading an attack: Super Class allies' Ki +2 for 2 turns

lines.text: "Earth-Protecting Heroes" Category allies' Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 50% up

lines.context: For every attack received or evaded

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 45% up
lines.context: When there is another "Earth-Protecting Heroes" Category ally attacking in the same turn
Before receiving an attack within the turn

lines.text: Chance of evading enemy's attack 40% up
Super Class allies' Ki +2 for 2 turns

active_skill.name: A Fantastic Fusion?!
active_skill.effect: Raises ATK by 500% temporarily,; causes ultimate damage to enemy; Within the turn activated,; all attacks become critical hits
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated after the character receives 5 or more attacks in battle Or after the character evades 5 or more attacks (including s) in battle (once only)
